transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Reign of Terror
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nReduces Eternal Enlightenment cooldown by 2 turns

description: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000080_1_2]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000080_1_2] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Nirvana's Inferno
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When an ally is hit, Counterattacks with <color=#28d9ed>Nirvana's Inferno</color>.\nBefore attacking, removes <color=#28d9ed>2</color> buff(s) from the target, and reduces Evasion for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. If the target is <color=#28d9ed>Earth element</color>, ignores their Resilience, and does not miss.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description: (Triggered Effect) When an ally is hit, Counterattacks with <color=#28d9ed>Nirvana's Inferno</color>.\nBefore attacking, removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000080_2_2_1]</color> buff(s) from the target, and reduces Evasion for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000080_2_4_1] turn(s)</color>. If the target is <color=#28d9ed>Earth element</color>, ignores their Resilience, and does not miss.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Eternal Enlightenment
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> and recovers Chain Points by <color=#28d9ed>10</color>. Increases the <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of boss monsters by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack and ignores the target's Resilience.
description: Attacks all enemies. Grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000080_3_1] turn(s)</color> and recovers Chain Points by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000080_3_2]</color>. Increases the <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of boss monsters by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack and ignores the target's Resilience.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and when attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and when attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000080_chain_1_1]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
